## EQUATIONS

See [link](http://visualmatheditor.equatheque.net/VisualMathEditor.html)


### Normal Distribution

$$f\left(x\right) = \frac{1}{\sigma \sqrt{2\pi } } e^{-\left(\frac{1}{2\sigma ^{2} } \right) } \left(x-\mu \right) ^{2} \\$$

$$L\left(\theta |x\right) = f\left(x|\theta \right) \\$$

$$f\left(x_{i} \right) = \frac{1}{\sigma \sqrt{2\pi } } e^{-\left(\frac{1}{2\sigma ^{2} } \right) } \left(x_{i} -\mu \right) ^{2} \\$$

### Likelihood of Normal Distribution

$$L\left(\theta |x \right) = \prod\limits_{i}{} f\left(x_{i} |\theta \right) \\$$


$$\ln \left(L\left(\theta |x \right)\right)  = \sum\limits_{i}{}\ln \left(f\left(x_{i} |\theta \right)\right) \\$$
